## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/SetFocusFilterIntent/invalidateFocusFilterAppContext()#see-also)

### [Configuring app context for the Focus](/documentation/AppIntents/SetFocusFilterIntent/invalidateFocusFilterAppContext()#Configuring-app-context-for-the-Focus)

[`var appContext: FocusFilterAppContext`](/documentation/appintents/setfocusfilterintent/appcontext)An app context that is associated with the focus configuration. The system will retrieve this app context and adapt the system behavior based on the context provided.**Required** Default implementation provided.
